attributes.action: Increase NHS workers wage by 30% or exclude them from taxes
attributes.additional_details: It is unfair that majority of people did not work and received money. Furloughed people partied and increased risks and self employed received thousands in grants -yet still working and being paid cash! NHS workers from cleaners to doctors had to work for their minimum wage - still had to pay for travel. Clapping is not a reward.
attributes.background: Increase wages of NHS workers who had worked during peak coronavirus period or exclude them from paying income tax if wages can not be increased - allow them free travel for the next 2 years - REWARD them!

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions calling for the same action:

Give NHS Covid heroes a minimum 5% pay rise
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/578004

Give a 10% pay increase to all NHS staff back dated to March 2020
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/593050

Exempt nhs workers from income tax
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/594998
